title: Convert Degrees to Radians with Modulo Operation
description:
RAD function converts an angle value from degrees to radians. Taking
into account that the DEG will not be greater than 360. If DEG is greater
than 360, 360 is to be subtracted as long as DEG is again between 0-360
°.
RAD(0) = 0 RAD(180) = π
RAD(360) = 0 RAD(540) = π
name: RAD

return_value.description: The calculated radians value, constrained to be within the range [0, 2PI].
